User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/14.0.815.0 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

Zimbra version 7.1.1 - Since Nightly version 7 (this includes version 8 builds) I have been unable to attach files using Zimbra's "drag and drop" feature.  Version 4,5, and 6 work just fine.  IE8 & 9, and Chrome/Chromium builds all work without a hitch as well.


Actual results:

Receive an error that says "Error loading file"


Expected results:

Using the drag and drop feature you should just be able to attached files to an email that is being composed.

I'd like to get back to using Firefox one day, but because of this feature being hindered I'm forced to use others for my email.  Thanks!
